Still no comments why

Excellent Quality!

Very good film!

My first ever 3D movie experience at home -I liked it very much.

Though the film got mixed reactions/reviews.

This film is about John Milton (Nicolas Cage) who has broken out of Hell to kill Jonah King (Billy Burke), a cult leader who tricked Milton's daughter into joining his followers in the wake of Milton's death, only to kill her and her husband and steal their baby daughter - Milton's granddaughter - to be sacrificed in a Satanist ritual.
(Source: Wikipedia.org)

To play this in Stereoscopic 3D....
Use "NVIDIA Stereoscopic 3D Video Player"
Layout: Side By Side
And Aspect Ratio: 16:9.
Oh, and thank you for uploading this, scharrow.

Has anyone tried splitting this via MKVMERGE? Mines coming up with error:Warning DTS_packetizer skipping(No valid DTS Header found  )this might make audio video out of sync.
and yes it does make it out of sync

Can someone please help, the movie starts to play fine and then after about a min at the intersection part my samsung 3d plasma gives me a message mode not supported please change your resolution.  Im playing it off the WD player and the resolution is set to auto.  Has anyone else had issues with this movie?
cant connect to this tracker. dunno why.

I put this on my harddrive to watch on my panasonic 3d tv and when i start it the audio is cutting in and out its like lil pops word after word then i try skipping a few chapters then freezes. Is it not really compatiable for the tv or there something wrong with the audio rip or what like i really thought this would work and its supposed too be good in 3d. Anyone got any suggestions?
